description: Disables automated security fixes for a repository. The authenticated user must have admin access to the repository. For more information, see "[Configuring automated security fixes](https://help.github.com/en/articles/configuring-automated-security-fixes)" in the GitHub Help documentation.

parameters.description: This API is under preview and subject to change.

previews.name: london
previews.note:
Enabling or disabling automated security fixes is currently available for developers to preview. To access this new endpoint during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:
```shell
application/vnd.github.london-preview+json
```
